GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Constituent Interaction Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CONSTITUENTINTERACTIONGLOBALCHANGE ( @IDSETREGISTERID uniqueidentifier = null, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @STATUSCODE tinyint = 0, @NEWSTATUSCODE tinyint = 0, @EXPECTEDDATE datetime = null, @NEWEXPECTEDDATE datetime = null, @EXPECTEDDATEPROCESS tinyint = 0, @FUNDRAISERID uniqueidentifier = null, @NEWFUNDRAISERID uniqueidentifier = null, @FUNDRAISERIDPROCESS tinyint = 0, @STATUSCODEPROCESS tinyint = 0, @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID uniqueidentifier, @NEWINTERACTIONTYPECODEID uniqueidentifier, @INTERACTIONTYPECODEIDPROCESS tinyint = 0, @EVENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @NEWEVENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @EVENTIDPROCESS tinyint = 0, @ACTUALDATE datetime = null, @NEWACTUALDATE datetime = null, @ACTUALDATEPROCESS tinyint = 0, @COMMENT nvarchar(max) = '', @NEWCOMMENT nvarchar(max) = '', @COMMENTPROCESS tinyint = 0, @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID uniqueidentifier = null, @NEWINTERACTIONCATEGORYID uniqueidentifier = null, @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID uniqueidentifier = null, @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID uniqueidentifier = null, @INTERACTIONCATEGORYPROCESS as tinyint = 0, @SPACE nvarchar(1), @SPACE1 nvarchar(1), @SPACE2 nvarchar(1), @SPACE3 nvarchar(1), @SPACE4 nvarchar(1), @SPACE5 nvarchar(1), @SPACE6 nvarchar(1), @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output )
as
set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate();
set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
if @IDSETREGISTERID is null raiserror ('IDSETREGISTERID is required',13,1);
/* Check for missing Sub Catagory. The Interaction table only stores Sub catagories. */ if @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID Is Null and @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID is not null RAISERROR 1000000 'A Category was entered but no Sub Category was entered. You must enter a Sub Category if a Category is entered.'
/* Check for missing Sub Catagory. The Interaction table only stores Sub catagories. */ if @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID Is Null and @NEWINTERACTIONCATEGORYID is not null RAISERROR 1000000 'A Category was entered but no Sub Category was entered. You must enter a Sub Category if a Category is entered.'
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
-- Build a CTE with values from the selection joined with the interaction table to get all fields ;with allSelectionResults (ID, FUNDRAISERID, STATUSCODE, INTERACTIONTYPECODEID, EXPECTEDDATE, ACTUALDATE, COMMENT, EVENTID, INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID) as (select INTERACTION.ID, INTERACTION.FUNDRAISERID, INTERACTION.STATUSCODE, INTERACTION.INTERACTIONTYPECODEID, INTERACTION.EXPECTEDDATE, INTERACTION.ACTUALDATE, INTERACTION.COMMENT, INTERACTION.EVENTID, INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID from INTERACTION join UFN_IDSETREADER_GETRESULTS(@IDSETREGISTERID) selection on INTERACTION.ID = selection.ID),
-- This filters any entry that does not conform to entry rules. -- Write records only for interaction records where changes need to be made
allItemsToUpdate ( ID, updateFundRaiserFlag, newFundRaiser, updateStatusCodeFlag, newStatusCode, updateInteractionTypeCodeIDFlag, newInteractionTypeCodeID, updateExpectedDateFlag, newExpectedDate, updateActualDateFlag, newActualDate, updateCommentFlag, newComment, updateEventIDFlag, newEventID, updateInteractionCategoryFlag, newInteractionSubCategoryID )
as
( -- Owner -- 1 --change specific select ID, 1, @NEWFUNDRAISERID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where (@FUNDRAISERIDPROCESS = 1) and (@NEWFUNDRAISERID is not null) and (FUNDRAISERID = @FUNDRAISERID)
union
-- 2 --change all selections select ID, 1, @NEWFUNDRAISERID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @FUNDRAISERIDPROCESS = 2 and @NEWFUNDRAISERID is not null and @FUNDRAISERID is null
union
-- 3 --blank specific select ID, 1, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where (@FUNDRAISERIDPROCESS = 3) and @NEWFUNDRAISERID is null and (FUNDRAISERID = @FUNDRAISERID)
union
-- 4 --blank all selections select ID, 1, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @FUNDRAISERIDPROCESS = 4 and @NEWFUNDRAISERID is null and @FUNDRAISERID is null
union
-- 5 --replace if blank select ID, 1, @NEWFUNDRAISERID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @FUNDRAISERIDPROCESS = 5 and @NEWFUNDRAISERID is not null and @FUNDRAISERID is null and FUNDRAISERID is null
union
-- Status -- 1 change for specific status code select ID, 0, null, 1, @NEWSTATUSCODE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @STATUSCODEPROCESS = 1 and @NEWSTATUSCODE is not null and @STATUSCODE = STATUSCODE
union
-- 2 change for all status codes in the selection select ID, 0, null, 1, @NEWSTATUSCODE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @STATUSCODEPROCESS = 2 and @NEWSTATUSCODE is not null and @STATUSCODE is null
union
--Contact method -- 1 change for specific status code select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWINTERACTIONTYPECODEID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONTYPECODEIDPROCESS = 1 and @NEWINTERACTIONTYPECODEID is not null and @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID = INTERACTIONTYPECODEID
union
-- 2 change for all status codes in the selection select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWINTERACTIONTYPECODEID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONTYPECODEIDPROCESS = 2 and @NEWINTERACTIONTYPECODEID is not null and @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID is null
union
-- Expected Date -- 1 - Change for specific Expected Date select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWEXPECTEDDATE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EXPECTEDDATEPROCESS = 1 and @NEWEXPECTEDDATE is not null and @EXPECTEDDATE = EXPECTEDDATE
union
-- 2 - Change for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWEXPECTEDDATE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EXPECTEDDATEPROCESS = 2 and @NEWEXPECTEDDATE is not null and @EXPECTEDDATE is null
union
-- Actual Date -- 1 - Change for specific Actual Date select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWACTUALDATE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @ACTUALDATEPROCESS = 1 and @NEWACTUALDATE is not null and @ACTUALDATE = ACTUALDATE
union
-- 2 - Change Actual Date for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWACTUALDATE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @ACTUALDATEPROCESS = 2 and @NEWACTUALDATE is not null and @ACTUALDATE is null
union
-- 3 - blank specific select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @ACTUALDATEPROCESS = 3 and @NEWACTUALDATE is null and @ACTUALDATE is not null and (@ACTUALDATE = ACTUALDATE)
union
-- 4 - blank all selections select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @ACTUALDATEPROCESS = 4 and @NEWACTUALDATE is null and @ACTUALDATE is null
union
-- 5 - replace if blank select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWACTUALDATE, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @ACTUALDATEPROCESS = 5 and @NEWACTUALDATE is not null and @ACTUALDATE is null and ACTUALDATE is null
union
-- Comment -- 1 - Change for specific Comment select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWCOMMENT, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @COMMENTPROCESS = 1 and @NEWCOMMENT <> '' and @COMMENT = COMMENT
union
-- 2 - Change comment for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWCOMMENT, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @COMMENTPROCESS = 2 and @NEWCOMMENT <> '' and @COMMENT = ''
union
-- 3 - blank specific select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, '', 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @COMMENTPROCESS = 3 and @NEWCOMMENT = '' and @COMMENT <> '' and (@COMMENT = COMMENT)
union
-- 4 - blank all selections select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, '', 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @COMMENTPROCESS = 4 and @NEWCOMMENT = '' and @COMMENT = ''
union
-- 5 - replace if blank select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWCOMMENT, 0, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @COMMENTPROCESS = 5 and @NEWCOMMENT <> '' and @COMMENT = '' and COMMENT = ''
union
-- Event -- 1 - Change for specific event select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWEVENTID, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EVENTIDPROCESS = 1 and @NEWEVENTID is not null and @EVENTID = EVENTID
union
-- 2 - Change event for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWEVENTID, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EVENTIDPROCESS = 2 and @NEWEVENTID is not null and @EVENTID is null
union
-- 3 - blank specific event select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EVENTIDPROCESS = 3 and @NEWEVENTID is null and @EVENTID is not null and (@EVENTID = EVENTID)
union
-- 4 - blank all selections select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, null, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EVENTIDPROCESS = 4 and @NEWEVENTID is null and @EVENTID is null
union
-- 5 - replace if blank select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWEVENTID, 0, null from allSelectionResults where @EVENTIDPROCESS = 5 and @NEWEVENTID is not null and @EVENTID is null and EVENTID is null
union
-- Sub Category -- 1 - Change for specific category/subcategory select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONCATEGORYPROCESS = 1 and @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is not null and @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID
union
-- 2 - Change category/subcategory for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONCATEGORYPROCESS = 2 and @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is not null
union
-- 3 - blank out sub category for specific subcategory select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, null from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONCATEGORYPROCESS = 3 and @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is null and @NEWINTERACTIONCATEGORYID is null and @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID
union
-- 4 - blank out sub category for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, null from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONCATEGORYPROCESS = 4 and @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is null and @NEWINTERACTIONCATEGORYID is null and @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is null and @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID is null
union
-- 5 - Change subcategory if subcategory blank for all selected interactions select ID, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 0, null, 1, @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID from allSelectionResults where @INTERACTIONCATEGORYPROCESS = 5 and @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is null and @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID is null and @NEWINTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is not null and INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID is null
),
-- Create a cte with only one record per interaction - no matter how many fields need -- to be updated. If at least one field needs to be updated, include it.
uniqueRows (ID) as (select distinct ID from allItemsToUpdate where updateFundRaiserFlag = 1 or updateStatusCodeFlag = 1 or updateInteractionTypeCodeIDFlag = 1 or updateExpectedDateFlag = 1 or updateActualDateFlag = 1 or updateCommentFlag = 1 or updateEventIDFlag = 1 or updateInteractionCategoryFlag = 1 ),
-- this is a list of interaction recs that need to be changed and the specific fields with changes itemsToUpdate (ID, updateFundRaiserFlag, newFundRaiser, updateStatusCodeFlag, newStatusCode, updateInteractionTypeCodeIDFlag, newInteractionTypeCodeID, updateExpectedDateFlag, newExpectedDate, updateActualDateFlag, newActualDate, updateCommentFlag, newComment, updateEventIDFlag, newEventID, updateInteractionCategoryFlag, newInteractionSubCategoryID )
as
(select uniqueRows.ID, fundRaiser.updateFundRaiserFlag, fundRaiser.newFundRaiser, statusCode.updateStatusCodeFlag, statusCode.newStatusCode, interactionTypeCode.updateInteractionTypeCodeIDFlag, interactionTypeCode.newInteractionTypeCodeID, expectedDate.updateExpectedDateFlag, expectedDate.newExpectedDate, actualDate.updateActualDateFlag, actualDate.newActualDate, commentTable.updateCommentFlag, commentTable.newComment, eventID.updateEventIDFlag, eventID.newEventID, interactionCategory.updateInteractionCategoryFlag, interactionCategory.newInteractionSubCategoryID
from uniqueRows
left join allItemsToUpdate fundRaiser on fundraiser.ID = uniqueRows.ID and fundraiser.updateFundRaiserFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate statusCode on statusCode.ID = uniqueRows.ID and statusCode.updateStatusCodeFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate interactionTypeCode on interactionTypeCode.ID = uniqueRows.ID and interactionTypeCode.updateInteractionTypeCodeIDFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate expectedDate on expectedDate.ID = uniqueRows.ID and expectedDate.updateExpectedDateFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate actualDate on actualDate.ID = uniqueRows.ID and actualDate.updateActualDateFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate commentTable on commentTable.ID = uniqueRows.ID and commentTable.updateCommentFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate eventID on eventID.ID = uniqueRows.ID and eventID.updateEventIDFlag = 1 left join allItemsToUpdate interactionCategory on interactionCategory.ID = uniqueRows.ID and interactionCategory.updateInteractionCategoryFlag = 1 )
-- all editing check have been made at this point -- The update tests the specific fields if an update is needed, if not it replaces the value -- with the existing value update INTERACTION set FUNDRAISERID = case when itemsToUpdate.updateFundRaiserFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newFundRaiser else INTERACTION.FUNDRAISERID end, STATUSCODE = case when itemsToUpdate.updateStatusCodeFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newStatusCode else INTERACTION.STATUSCODE end, INTERACTIONTYPECODEID = case when itemsToUpdate.updateInteractionTypeCodeIDFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newInteractionTypeCodeID else INTERACTION.INTERACTIONTYPECODEID end, EXPECTEDDATE = case when itemsToUpdate.updateExpectedDateFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newExpectedDate else INTERACTION.EXPECTEDDATE end, ACTUALDATE = case when itemsToUpdate.updateActualDateFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newActualDate else INTERACTION.ACTUALDATE end, COMMENT = case when itemsToUpdate.updateCommentFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newComment else INTERACTION.COMMENT end, EVENTID = case when itemsToUpdate.updateEventIDFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newEventID else INTERACTION.EVENTID end, INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = case when itemsToUpdate.updateInteractionCategoryFlag = 1 then itemsToUpdate.newInteractionSubCategoryID else INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID end
from INTERACTION join itemsToUpdate on INTERACTION.ID = itemsToUpdate.ID
set @NUMBEREDITED = @@ROWCOUNT;
end try
begin catch
-- Raise an error with the details of the exception declare @ErrMsg nvarchar(4000), @ErrSeverity int select @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE(), @ErrSeverity = ERROR_SEVERITY() raiserror(@ErrMsg, @ErrSeverity, 1)
return 1;
end catch
